maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastframebufferwrapper.cpp
/*

#include "beastwrappers/beastframebufferwrapper.h"

namespace beastmaya {


BeastFramebuffer::~BeastFramebuffer()
{
        if (!m_persistent) {
                // Remove it here or let it die with the job/update
                BEAST_CALL(ILBDestroyFramebuffer(m_obj));
        }
}

void BeastFramebuffer::getChannelCount( int& channels )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetChannelCount(m_obj, &channels));
}

void BeastFramebuffer::getResolution( int& width, int& height )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetResolution(m_obj, &width, &height));
}

void BeastFramebuffer::readRegionHDR( int minX, int minY, int maxX, int maxY, ILBChannelSelection channels, std::vector<float>& target )
{
        int numChannels;
        getChannelCount(numChannels);
        target.resize((maxX - minX) * (maxY - minY) * numChannels);
        BEAST_CALL(ILBReadRegionHDR(m_obj, minX, minY, maxX, maxY, channels, &target[0]));
}

void BeastFramebuffer::readRegionLDR( int minX, int minY, int maxX, int maxY, ILBChannelSelection channels, float gamma, std::vector<unsigned char>& target )
{
        int numChannels;
        getChannelCount(numChannels);
        target.resize((maxX - minX) * (maxY - minY) * numChannels);
        BEAST_CALL(ILBReadRegionLDR(m_obj, minX, minY, maxX, maxY, channels, gamma, &target[0]));
}

void BeastFramebuffer::setPersistent( bool persistent )
{
        m_persistent = persistent;
}

}
